tweet: Pay discrimination in the workplace is real. The Paycheck Fairness Act (H.R. 7) is an important step toward ending gender-based wage discrimination & ensuring all women receive equal pay for equal work. https://bishop.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/bishop-statement-on-the-passing-of-hr-7-the-paycheck-fairness-act …

I stand with @SenatorIsakson for condemning @POTUS’ reprehensible comments about the late @SenJohnMcCain. The continued denigration of the late Senator, POW, and veteran is beneath the Office of the President and the nation.

My thoughts are w/ those throughout the Midwest who were affected by the recent floods. I know all too well the devastating impact that natural disasters can have on rural communities, & I am grateful to all of those who are helping them recover & rebuild.

I was deeply saddened to learn of the passing of Dr. Lonnie King Jr. & I send my condolences to his family.
